questions.question: Considering the overall shape and form, what best describes the product's packaging?
What primary color is prominently displayed on the lower portion of the packaging?

Describe the apparent texture of the food item visible through the packaging.
What appears to be the primary material used for the main body of the packaging?
What is the dominant shape of the individual food items, as suggested by the packaging contents?
What is the color primarily associated with the food item, based on what's shown through the packaging?

What secondary color is noticeable on a small portion of the upper packaging?

Considering the structural form, how would you characterize the overall shape of the product's packaging?

What is the visible pattern, if any, on the food item or the packaging, aside from text?
